entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Custom host throws exception when using breakpoints #63838
  • Handling of "invalid" HTTP header values results in values being incorrectly reordered #63833
  • HTTP Headers are enumerated in the wrong order when added via a mix of parsed and unparsed APIs #63831
  • [API Proposal]: RemoteCertificateValidationCallback cannot detect future certificates #63830
  • JIT: Faster comparison against Vector128<>.Zero #63829
    Future

Closed

  • Add Regex FindFirstChar optimization for a setloopatomic followed by a literal #62445
    7.0.0
  • Handling of "invalid" #63832
  • [API Proposal]: CollectionsMarshal.GetValueRef with ReadOnlySpan<char> key #63827
  • Poor codegen for Vector128.Create() with constants sharing the same value #63432
    7.0.0
  • Regex compiler / source generator can use IndexOf to speed up lazy loop #62669
    7.0.0
  • Regex compiler/ source generator can use {Last}IndexOf for strings in greedy char loop #62670
    7.0.0
  • TCP keepalive behavior difference between 5.0 and .NET Core 3.1 on Mac #46728
    Future
  • [wasm] Wasm.Console.Sample timeouts on windows/helix #52137
    7.0.0
  • 3 timeouts in SendPacketsAsync on Windows 7 #60204
    7.0.0
  • Two `System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SendPacketsAsync` tests failing on `Windows x64 debug` #60267
    7.0.0
  • 3 `System.Net.Sockets.Tests`failing on `Libraries Test Run release coreclr windows x64 Debug` #62384
    7.0.0
  • SendPacketsElement_FileStreamMultiPartMixed_MultipleFileStreams_Success failed on windows.11.amd64.clientpre.open #58898
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SendPacketsAsync.SendPacketsElement_FileZeroCount_Success sometimes fails #60017
    7.0.0
  • Regex UpdateBumpalong logic should be applicable to lazy loops as well #62677
    7.0.0
  • Regex UpdateBumpalong logic is flawed and likely costing us perf #62676
    7.0.0
  • Http negotiate auth on macOS not working with SocketsHttpHandler #45785
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Member resolving fix for derived attributes (#62937) #63837
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection` #63836
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Preserve existing keys in dictionary #63834
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Check if the child object is in the heap range before get_region_plan_gen_num #63828
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Delete UMThkCallFrame #63826
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove CheckForOverflowUnderflow #63825
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fix formatting of resource string where excess arguments are passed #63824
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Avoid name collision for covariant and hidden properties (#63443) #63823
    area-System.Text.Json

Merged

  • Produce ILC rsp in separate target #63820
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • "MOffset" size estimate fix #63766
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete notifyexternals.* #63835
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add Regex FindFirstChar optimization for a literal after an atomic loop #63477
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Perform some minor code cleanup of the System.Numerics and System.Runtime.Intrinsics namespaces #63753
    area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: Mark constant arguments of HWINTRINSIC nodes as DONT_CSE #63442
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid unnecessary string allocation in HttpRuleParser.GetHostLength #63641
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Improve use of {Last}IndexOf{Any} in Regex loops #63428
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [metadata] Use MonoDefaults from components without hacks #63822
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Split `sendtohelixhelp.proj` to extract wasm, and mobile bits to separate files. #63373
    area-Build-mono
  • Serialize SendPacketsAsync tests #63702
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Improve Regex UpdateBumpalong optimization for non-atomic and lazy loops #63398
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Fix issues with verify_regions, clear_batch_mark_array_bits. #63798
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [arm64] JIT: Redundant zero/sign extensions after ldrX/ldrsX #62630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add blsr #63545
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't reuse registers in Debug mode #63698
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Actually properly type primary selectors #63752
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reduce the memory footprint of HttpHeaders #62981
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Faster IndexOf for substrings #63285
    area-System.Memory
  • Implement IEquatable<T> on value types overriding Equals (and enable CA1066/CA1067) #63690
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Unify string.{Last}IndexOfAny and span.{Last}IndexOfAny #63817
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Disable partial generic sharing for gparams with non-enum cons… #63813
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix profiling objectsallocatedbyclass #63814
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: yet another OSR stress mode #62980
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add path information to INotifyInstanceUserLimitExceeded #62096
    area-System.IO
  • Moved AssemblyName helpers to managed #62866
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • BackgroundService doc: improve API documentation #63011
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Search native code in all R2R ni.dll in version bubble #57277
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Extend System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86 to support nint and nuint #63594
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono] Hot Reload: initial push to support adding lambdas #63513
    area-EnC-mono
  • Prevent crash if stack trace has function pointer #63787
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Range Checks for "(uint)i > cns" pattern #62864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve Directory.Move and DirectoryInfo.MoveTo #63675
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Fix escaped strings for TryGetDateTime(Offset) #63534
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • NativeAOT: Allow Delegate and MulticastDelegate marshalling #63219
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT: ICustomMarshaller #62921
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Arm64] Keep unrolling InitBlock and CopyBlock up to 128 bytes #63422
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • 'cmeq' and 'fcmeq' Vector64<T>.Zero/Vector128<T>.Zero ARM64 containment optimizations #62933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Disable the Runtime_34587 regression test with GH issue #63818 #63819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add runtime-extra-platforms pipeline to have matching runtime PR and Rolling builds #62564
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix x86 stackwalk for UnmanagedCallersOnly #61075
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [Arm64] Don't use D-copies in CopyBlock #63588
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix OpenSSL 3 reporting an OutOfMemoryException for missing private key #63804
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Implement System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DisabledRuntimeMarshallingAttribute on CoreCLR-family of runtimes/type systems #63320
    area-Interop-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] JIT/EE interface for getting ABI-info #62893
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Add optimization "X & 1 == 1" to "X & 1" (#61412) #62818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Introduce `BasicBlock::KindIs()` for checking bbJumpKind #63203
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Begin using the xplat hardware intrinsics in BitArray #63722
    area-System.Collections
  • Enable System.Text.Json tests on netfx #63803
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [WIP] Morph `Vector.Create(0)` to `Vector.Zero` #63821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
